name: Awaiting Room
description:
Awaiting Room is a short narrative experience about the afterlife. Spend time to talk to various characters as your outcome is decided.

This game was made for the Portland Indie Game Squad June 2020 Summer Slow Jam with the themes of Turn Based and Alternate Timeline.

Art & Animation - Hagen Deloss
Programming - Tyler Edwards & Christian Scandariato
Writing - Kristen Scandariato
Sound & Music - Kristen Scandariato
